name: PASSPORT RENEWAL SIMULATOR 2022
description:
1. HOW IS THIS GAME RELEVANT TO THE THEME? (RENEWAL)

I decided to go for the more literal take which is to extend the period of validity of a license, subscription or contract. That's how I ended up choosing passport renewal. 

2. WHAT SORT OF EXPERIENCE/MESSAGE ARE YOU HOPING YOUR GAME WILL BRING ACROSS TO THE PLAYER?

I wanted to reimagine the frustrating experience that renewing the passport has brought forward to Singaporeans in the past year... but shown in a more light-hearted angle.

Play as Pappy the Passport as they siam through obstacles just to get renewed. 

3. WHY DID YOU END UP CHOOSING THE DIRECTION OF YOUR GAME?

Ever since travel restrictions got eased up, I have seen stories online, and have heard from friends about their renewal experience and I just found it hilarious and so Singaporean that how everybody knows how soul-sucking it's gonna be to try and expedite their passports but do it anyway because y'know, travel restrictions are eased.

PLAYER CONTROLS

  • WASD or arrow keys to move
  • Left mouse or spacebar to progress the game/click on stuff
  • Don't worry about dying/fainting/unaliving! You'll regain a heart every 10 seconds that you're not hit by a bullet.
  • Also you will restart with full health if you do actually manage to die/faint/unalive in a round.
